articles.title: Bengal school jobs scam: Rs 28 crore cash, 6 kg of gold recovered from Partha Chatterjee’s aide Arpita Mukherjee’s house
articles.description: On Monday, a special court sent both Partha Chatterjee and Arpita Mukherjee to ED custody till August 3.

articles.title: Govt job rush: in 8 years, 22 crore applied, only 7.22 lakh were selected
articles.description: The broad trend suggests that the number of candidates selected for government jobs has been declining since 2014-15, with 2019-20 being the only exception.
articles.content: The rush for government jobscontinued unabated over the last eight years but less than 1 per cent of applications received were selected. Of the 22.05 crore applications received from 2014-15 to 2021… [+3774 chars]
